products.title: Origin Cream - Day Night Blind
products.description: The ultimate neutral, the origin's cream is light, airy, and versatile in colour, and sleek and shapely in form. The smooth threads are tightly woven to create a sturdy yet lightweight fabric, and the sliding netting is simple and translucent. Meld the cream with peach and coral tones for an unconventional, yet cheerful and pretty, look in the family bathroom. Choose white walls and peach or coral tiling, accessorising with matching towels, wall art, and trinkets.

products.title: Origin Cream - Vista Blind
products.description: Give your home a touch of the crisp modern aesthetic with origin cream. A finely woven voile serves as the perfect companion for the rich creamy fabric which sits underneath and allows you to subtly adjust the light levels to frame your room exactly how the occasion requires. Cream adds a homely quality to your decor that allows you to introduce anything from a light washed out blue to a gentle stone grey as you craft a relaxing atmosphere to savour.
